benchmark_details.name: ROLECONFLICTBENCH: A BENCHMARK OF ROLE CONFLICT SCENARIOS FOR EVALUATING LLMS’ CONTEXTUAL SENSITIVITY
benchmark_details.overview: ROLECONFLICTBENCH is a novel benchmark designed to evaluate LLMs’ contextual sensitivity in complex social dilemmas, generating over 13,914 role conflict scenarios that systematically vary expectations and urgency levels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate whether LLMs exhibit contextual sensitivity in complex social situations and uncover their underlying preferences.

data.source: Automatically generated using a structured multi-stage LLM-based approach.

methodology.calculation: The sensitivity score quantifies the model's contextual responsiveness based on decisions across varying role urgency.
methodology.interpretation: Lower scores indicate better contextual sensitivity.
methodology.validation: Human-reviewed for plausibility and situational appropriateness.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis shows model biases towards roles based on gender and cultural attributes.
targeted_risks.harm: Reinforcement of societal biases in role prioritization.
